San_Rafael.Lake Lagunitas:
Lake Lagunitas is a reservoir on Lagunitas Creek in Marin County, California.
Lake Lagunitas is one of seven reservoirs providing potable water to the Marin Municipal Water District. It is the oldest and smallest lake in the Mount Tamalpais watershed, with surface area of 22 acres (0.034 square miles or 8.9 hectares).
